column2: After a great voyage across the salt, your men have apprehended a heathen of particular importance.  To us he is just a man - and a weak one at that - but to them he is the holiest of holy men.
Our Voyages are blessed. We must call the Godis.

You have brought together every important holy man within your realm.  All of your hirdmen and councilors are in your throne room.  After intense debate, you all reach the same conclusion as to what must be done.
The ceremony is short, and the rites are performed to perfection.  You have sent a message to Christendom... May your name ring from every shore!
No! We must wait... I have plans for him.
